licence_overview:
If you are an operator of a business in Northern Ireland regulated by a Part A pollution prevention and control permit issued by the [Northern Ireland Environment Agency (NIEA)](http://www.doeni.gov.uk/niea/ "Northern Ireland Environment Agency (NIEA)"){:rel="external"}, you will be required to report your annual pollution releases to NIEA.

To do so you must fill out a pollution inventory form and include information on the following:

* details of your business and business premises
* all chemical releases you have made into the environment
* all chemical transfers you have made into wastewater
* waste transfers - off-site or overseas

You must return your reporting form to the NIEA by 31 January each year.

*[NIEA]: Northern Ireland Environment Agency
